p: The variables showed parametric distribution and thus one-way ANOVA was used to test the antibacterial effect of the plants’ extract against M. luteus followed by Tukey’s post hoc test for pairwise comparison between the tested groups (Fig. 2). An ANOVA indicated that there was statistically significant antibacterial effect of the extract against M. luteus, F (4, 30) = 109.87, P value < 0001.
